text: The 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup Challenge Playoff is an upcoming cricket tournament scheduled to take place in 2023, to decide the final four places in the Cricket World Cup Challenge League for qualification for the 2027 World Cup. The host of the tournament and the status of the matches have yet to be confirmed. It will feature the bottom four teams from the 2019–21 ICC Cricket World Cup Challenge League along with an additional four sides. The four additional sides will be the top four ranked in the ICC T20I Championship that did not take part in the 2023 Cricket World Cup Qualification process. Four sides will qualify from this tournament to complete the twelve-team World Cup Challenge League field for the 2027 cycle. ==Teams and qualification== {| class="wikitable" width="850" ! width="30%" |Means of qualification ! width="25%" |Date ! width="15%" |Venue ! width="5%" |Berths ! width="25%" |Qualified |- |Challenge League (Bottom 4) |2021 |Various | style="text- align:center;" |4 |TBA |- |ICC T20I Championship |N/A |Various | style="text- align:center;" |4 |TBA |} ==References== Category:International cricket competitions
title: 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup Challenge Playoff
